text: Dragana Kostova (; born 2 January 1991) is a Macedonian footballer who plays as a defender for 1. liga club ŽFK Dragon 2014 and the Macedonia women's national team. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Macedonian women's footballers Category:North Macedonia women's international footballers
title: Dragana Kostova
